game.name: Haunted Room : 205
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 당신은 선천적으로 영적인 감지 능력을 가진 청년입니다. 돈을 아끼기 위해 유난히 싼 월세 방을 빌렸고, 예전처럼 ‘그들’과 평화롭게 지낼 수 있으리라 생각했습니다. 하지만 곧, 이곳의 이상 현상이 과거보다 훨씬 깊고 위험하다는 사실을 알게 됩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: To save money, you rent an unusually cheap apartment, believing you could coexist with “them” as you always have. But you soon discover that the disturbances here run far deeper—and are far more dangerous—than anything you’ve encountered before.

reviewHighlights.text: Short but fun horror game. Caught myself closing my eyes IRL more than in game. Recommended!
This is the first game I've played from this developer. I streamed this with my community on twitch and played this on easy because we simply just wan...
